Thanks Barb,

This games been out for quite a while now... I believe gamespot and 
1up.com wrote an article about it. Anyway, I've been tempted to 
shell out some money for this game but I have a question to some of 
our more knowledgeable members... Since this will be a PS2 import, 
do you think this will run on my PS2 (US) or do I need some other 
contraption installed (aka modchip)? Thanks in advance guys/gals...
